Posts.HTML:
Been playing around with quest for a month or so, very impressed with how easy everything fits together.

My favourite games are Sid Meiers Pirates (had it on the c64 and couple years ago played the pc version through dosbox).
Darklands another great game, open ended and has optional missions and storyline.
Saboteur from the c64
Tenchu (first one)
Oblivion and the hitman games - I will be here for hour listing all my 'favourite' games so will stop now

Currently using quest to build three games :
Night of the Ninja - your a ninja and you do ninjary stuff. - currently shelved, building tutorial mission.
Realms - an offline MUD, when completed the player will be able to spend there time fishing, thrashing monsters,becoming a prominent figure in the lands or just a typical vagabond. - currently building three areas, will be a very large place eventually with different villages,towns,cities,islands/countries.
No title - based in the harry potter world, the player can travel about being a wizard. - currently building Hogsmeade.
